abstract: At a conference, Jeffrey R. Immelt, the chief executive of General Electric, did not despair over stagnant domestic growth and increased competition from China and other foreign producers.
snippet: At a conference, Jeffrey R. Immelt, the chief executive of General Electric, did not despair over stagnant domestic growth and increased competition from China and other foreign producers.
lead_paragraph: Jeffrey R. Immelt, the chief executive of General Electric, is not despairing over stagnant domestic growth and increased competition from China and other foreign producers.
